00039 class SearchViewItem( QWidget ):
00040         def __init__( self, uiFile, parent = None ):
00041                 QWidget.__init__( self, parent )
00042                 loadUi( uiFile, self )
00043                 self.index = None
00044 
00045 ## @brief The SearchView class provides a view for a list of custom widgets.
00046 #
00047 # SearchView, simplifies the task of creating a list-like view for a model
00048 # in which the items of the list are custom widgets. Even more, SearchView
00049 # allows to trivially use a '.ui' to be used as items, where you only need
00050 # to map model indexes into .ui widget names.
00051 class SearchView( QAbstractItemView ):
00052         def __init__( self, parent = None ):
00053                 QAbstractItemView.__init__( self, parent )
00054                 self.setViewport( QWidget(self) )
00055                 layout = QVBoxLayout( self.viewport() )
00056                 layout.setSpacing( 0 )
00057                 layout.setMargin( 0 )
00058                 self.items = []
00059                 self.selected = -1
00060                 self.keyboard = ""
00061                 self.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy( Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn )
00062                 self.connect( self.verticalScrollBar(), SIGNAL('valueChanged(int)'), self.scrollBarChanged )
00063                 self.setEditTriggers( QAbstractItemView.NoEditTriggers )
00064 
00065         def scrollBarChanged(self, value):
00066                 self.viewport().move( 0, - value )
00067 
00068         ## Map the label or widget of each item with 
00069         # the corresponding column of the model
00070         #
00071         # Example of a valid map:
00072         # \code
00073         #  map = [ ('uiModel', 3), ('uiName', 4), ('uiHeadline', 5), ('uiRanking', 6) ]
00074         #  uiItems.setModelItemMap( map )
00075         # \endcode
00076         def setModelItemMap(self, map):
00077                 self.map = map
00078 
00079         ## Sets the .ui file that will be used to represent each item
00080         #  int the list
00081         #
00082         # The .ui file should contain QLabels which will be mapped using
00083         # setModelItemMap().
00084         def setItemUi(self, uiFile ):
00085                 self.uiFile = uiFile
00086 
00087         ## You may inherit this class and reimplement this function if your items,
00088         # aren't created from ui files or the file is not composed
00089         # only of simple labels.
00090         def createItemWidget(self, parent):
00091                 return SearchViewItem( self.uiFile, parent )
00092 
00093         ## Reimplement this function if you don't use the map to automatically
00094         # fill the item widget. Note that the index of the model is inside 
00095         # 'item.index'.
00096         def fillItemWidget( self, item ):
00097                 pass
00098 
00099         # Functions required by QAbstractItemView
00100         def indexAt( self, point ):
00101                 idx = QModelIndex()
00102                 y = 0
00103                 for x in self.items:
00104                         if x.geometry().contains(point):
00105                                 return x.index
00106                         y += 1
00107                 return idx
00108 
00109         def keyboardSearch( self, search ):
00110                 search = self.keyboard + unicode(search).lower()
00111                 found = False
00112                 start = max(self.selected, 0)
00113                 for x in range(start, len(self.items)):
00114                         if unicode(self.items[x].uiName.text()).lower().startswith( search ):
00115                                 found = True
00116                                 break
00117                 if found:
00118                         self.selected = x
00119                         self.keyboard = search
00120                         self.highlightSelected()
00121 
00122         def scrollTo( self, index, hint ): 
00123                 pos = None
00124                 if hint == QAbstractItemView.EnsureVisible:
00125                         rect = self.visualRect(index)
00126                         if rect.y() + rect.height() > abs(self.viewport().y()) + self.height():
00127                                 # Position at bottom    
00128                                 rect = self.visualRect(index)
00129                                 pos = rect.y() + rect.height() - self.height() 
00130                                 pos = max( pos, 0 )
00131                         elif rect.y() < abs(self.viewport().y()):
00132                                 # Position at top
00133                                 pos = self.visualRect(index).y()
00134                 elif hint == QAbstractItemView.PositionAtTop:
00135                         pos = self.visualRect(index).y()
00136                 elif hint == QAbstractItemView.PositionAtBottom:
00137                         rect = self.visualRect(index)
00138                         pos = rect.y() + rect.height() - self.height() 
00139                         pos = max( pos, 0 )
00140                 elif hint == QAbstractItemView.PositionAtCenter:
00141                         rect = self.visualRect(index)
00142                         pos = rect.y() + (rect.height()/2) - ( self.height()/2 )
00143                         pos = max( pos, 0 )
00144 
00145                 if pos != None:
00146                         self.viewport().move( 0, - pos )
00147 
00148         def visualRect( self, index ):
00149                 for x in self.items:
00150                         if x.index == index:
00151                                 return x.geometry()
00152                 return QRect()
00153 
00154         def isIndexHidden( self, index ):
00155                 for x in self.items:
00156                         if x.index == index:
00157                                 if x.geometry().y() > self.viewport().y() + self.viewport().height() or \
00158                                         x.geometry().y + x.geometry().height() < self.viewport().y():
00159                                         return True
00160                                 else:
00161                                         return False
00162                 return False
00163 
00164         def horizontalOffset(self):
00165                 return 0
00166 
00167         def verticalOffset(self):
00168                 return self.viewport().y()
00169 
00170         def moveCursor( self, action, modifiers ):
00171                 if len(self.items) == 0:
00172                         return QModelIndex()
00173                 if action == QAbstractItemView.MoveUp:
00174                         selected = self.selected - 1
00175                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveDown:
00176                         selected = self.selected + 1
00177                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveHome:
00178                         selected = 0
00179                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveEnd:
00180                         selected = len(self.items) - 1
00181                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MovePageUp:
00182                         selected = self.selected - 3
00183                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MovePageDown:
00184                         selected = self.selected + 3
00185                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveNext:
00186                         selected = self.selected + 1
00187                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MovePrevious:
00188                         selected = self.selected - 1
00189                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveRight:
00190                         selected = self.selected + 1
00191                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveLeft:
00192                         selected = self.selected - 1
00193 
00194                 selected = min(selected, len(self.items)-1)
00195                 selected = max(selected, 0)
00196                 if selected != self.selected:
00197                         self.selected = selected
00198                         self.highlightSelected()
00199                 return self.items[self.selected].index
00200 
00201         def setSelection( self, rect, flags ):
00202                 self.selected = -1
00203                 for x in range(len(self.items)):
00204                         if self.items[x].geometry().intersects( rect ):
00205                                 self.selected = x
00206                 if self.selected != -1:
00207                         self.selectionModel().select( self.items[self.selected].index, QItemSelectionModel.Current )
00208                 else:
00209                         self.selectionModel().select( QModelIndex(), QItemSelectionModel.Current )
00210                 self.highlightSelected()
00211 
00212         def visualRegionForSelection( self, selection ):
00213                 region = QRegion()
00214                 for x in self.items:
00215                         for y in selection.indexes():
00216                                 if x.index == y:
00217                                         region.unite( QRegion( x.geometry() ) )
00218                 return region
00219 
00220         def rowsInserted( self, index, start, end ):
00221                 for y in range(start, end+1):
00222                         item = self.createItemWidget( self.viewport() )
00223                         item.index = self.model().index( y, 0, index )
00224                         # Fill in the item
00225                         if self.map:
00226                                 # If there is a map, it means that autofilling is enabled
00227                                 for x in self.map:
00228                                         idx = self.model().index( y, x[1], index )
00229                                         exec("item.%s.setText( self.model().data( idx ).toString() )" % x[0] )
00230                         else:
00231                                 # Otherwise let the user fill in the item
00232                                 self.fillItemWidget( item )
00233                         self.items.append(item)
00234                         self.viewport().layout().insertWidget( self.viewport().layout().count() -1, item )
00235                         self.updateViewport( item.height() )
00236 
00237                 if self.selected == -1:
00238                         self.selected = 0
00239                         self.highlightSelected() 
00240 
00241         def updateViewport(self, itemHeight):
00242                 height = 0
00243                 for x in self.items:
00244                         height += x.geometry().height()
00245                 self.viewport().setFixedHeight( height )
00246                 diff = self.viewport().height() - self.height()
00247                 if diff < 0:
00248                         diff = 0
00249                 self.verticalScrollBar().setRange( 0, diff )
00250                 self.verticalScrollBar().setValue( 0 )
00251 
00252         def rowsAboutToBeRemoved( self, index, start, end ):
00253                 s = self.model().index( start, 0, index )
00254                 e = self.model().index( end, 0, index )
00255                 remove = []
00256                 for x in self.items:
00257                         if ( s < x.index or s == x.index ) and (x.index < e or x.index == e):
00258                                 remove.append( x )
00259                                 x.deleteLater()
00260                 for x in remove:
00261                         del self.items[self.items.index(x)]
00262                 if self.selected >= len(self.items):
00263                         self.selected = -1
00264 
00265         def highlightSelected(self):
00266                 if self.selected < 0:
00267                         return
00268                 for x in range(len(self.items)):
00269                         if x == self.selected:
00270                                 self.items[x].setStyleSheet( 'QWidget{background: yellow}' )    
00271                         else:
00272                                 self.items[x].setStyleSheet( '' )

00274 (FullTextSearchDialogUi, FullTextSearchDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('full_text_search.ui') )
00275 
00276 ## @brief The FullTextSearchDialog class shows a dialog for searching text at all indexed models.
00277 #
00278 # The dialog has a text box for the user input and a combo box to search at one specific
00279 # model or all models that have at least one field indexed.
00280 class FullTextSearchDialog( QDialog, FullTextSearchDialogUi ):
00281         def __init__(self, parent = None):
00282                 QDialog.__init__( self, parent )
00283                 FullTextSearchDialogUi.__init__( self )
00284                 self.setupUi( self )
00285                 
00286                 self.setModal( True )
00287 
00288                 self.result=None
00289 
00290                 self.model = FullTextSearchModel(self)
00291                 #self.uiItems = SearchView( self )
00292                 map = [ ('uiModel', 3), ('uiName', 4), ('uiHeadline', 5),
00293                         ('uiRanking', 6) ]
00294                 self.uiItems.setModelItemMap( map )
00295                 self.uiItems.setItemUi( Common.uiPath('searchviewitem.ui') )
00296                 self.uiItems.setModel( self.model )
00297                 self.layout().insertWidget( 1, self.uiItems )
00298 
00299                 self.uiErrorMessage.hide()
00300                 try:
00301                         answer = Rpc.session.call('/fulltextsearch', 'indexedModels', Rpc.session.context )
00302                         self.uiModel.addItem( _('(Everywhere)'), QVariant( False ) )    
00303                         for x in answer:
00304                                 self.uiModel.addItem( x['name'], QVariant( x['id'] ) )
00305                         if len(answer) == 0:
00306                                 self.disableQueries( _('<b>Full text search is not configured.</b><br/>Go to <i>Administration - Configuration - Full Text Search - Indexes</i>. Then add the fields you want to be indexed and finally use <i>Update Full Text Search</i>.') )
00307                 except:
00308                         self.disableQueries( _('<b>Full text search module not installed.</b><br/>Go to <i>Administration - Modules administration - Uninstalled Modules</i> and add the <i>full_text_search</i> module.') )
00309 
00310                 self.title = _('Full Text Search')
00311                 self.title_results = _('Full Text Search (%%d result(s))')
00312 
00313                 self.setWindowTitle( self.title )
00314 
00315                 self.limit = 10 
00316                 self.offset = 0
00317                 self.pushNext.setEnabled( False )
00318                 self.pushPrevious.setEnabled( False )
00319 
00320                 self.connect( self.pushAccept, SIGNAL( "clicked( )"), self.open )
00321                 self.connect( self.uiItems, SIGNAL( "doubleClicked(QModelIndex)"), self.open )
00322                 self.connect( self.pushCancel , SIGNAL( "clicked()"), self.reject )
00323                 self.connect( self.pushFind, SIGNAL( "clicked()"), self.find )
00324                 self.connect( self.pushPrevious, SIGNAL( "clicked()" ), self.previous )
00325                 self.connect( self.pushNext, SIGNAL( "clicked()" ), self.next )
00326                 self.show()
00327 
00328         def disableQueries(self, text):
00329                 self.uiModel.setEnabled( False )
00330                 self.pushFind.setEnabled( False )
00331                 self.pushAccept.setEnabled( False )
00332                 self.uiText.setEnabled( False )
00333                 self.uiItems.hide()
00334                 self.uiErrorMessage.setText( text )
00335                 self.uiErrorMessage.show()
00336 
00337         def textToQuery(self):
00338                 q = unicode( self.uiText.text() ).strip()
00339                 while q != q.replace( '  ', ' ' ):
00340                         q = q.replace( '  ', ' ' )
00341                 q = q.replace(' ', '|')
00342                 return q
00343 
00344         def query(self):
00345                 if self.uiModel.currentIndex() == 0:
00346                         model = False
00347                 else:
00348                         model = unicode( self.uiModel.itemData( self.uiModel.currentIndex() ).toString() )
00349                 answer = Rpc.session.execute('/fulltextsearch', 'search', self.textToQuery(), self.limit, self.offset , model, Rpc.session.context)
00350                 self.model.setList( answer )
00351                 if len(answer) < self.limit:
00352                         self.pushNext.setEnabled( False )
00353                 else:
00354                         self.pushNext.setEnabled( True )
00355                 if self.offset == 0:
00356                         self.pushPrevious.setEnabled( False )
00357                 else:
00358                         self.pushPrevious.setEnabled( True )
00359                 
00360         def previous(self):
00361                 self.offset = max(0, self.offset - self.limit )
00362                 self.query()
00363                 
00364         def next(self):
00365                 self.offset = self.offset + self.limit
00366                 self.query()
00367 
00368         def find(self):
00369                 self.offset = 0
00370                 self.query()
00371 
00372         def reload(self):
00373                 self.view.widget.model().removeAll()
00374                 model = self.view.widget.model()
00375                 index1 =  model.index( 1,1 )
00376                 selectionModel = QItemSelectionModel( model )
00377                 selectionModel.select( index1 , QItemSelectionModel.Rows )
00378 
00379         def open( self ):
00380                 idx = self.uiItems.selectionModel().currentIndex()
00381                 if idx.isValid():
00382                         id = self.model.item( idx.row(), 0 ).text()
00383                         model = self.model.item( idx.row(), 2 ).text()
00384                         self.result = ( int(str(id)), unicode(model) )
00385                         self.accept()
00386 
00387 class FullTextSearchModel( QStandardItemModel ):
00388         def __init__(self, parent = None):
00389                 QStandardItemModel.__init__(self, parent)
00390                 self.rootItem = self.invisibleRootItem()
00391                 self.setColumnCount( 7 )
00392                 self.setHeaderData( 0, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _("ID") ) )
00393                 self.setHeaderData( 1, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _("Model ID") ) )
00394                 self.setHeaderData( 2, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _("Model Name") ) )
00395                 # Model Description
00396                 self.setHeaderData( 3, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _("Type") ) )
00397                 self.setHeaderData( 4, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _("Name") ) )
00398                 self.setHeaderData( 5, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _("Text") ) )
00399                 self.setHeaderData( 6, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _("Ranking") ) )
00400 
00401                 self.serverOrder = ['id', 'model_id', 'model_name', 'model_label', 'name', 'headline', 'ranking']
00402 
00403         def setList(self, list):
00404                 if self.rowCount() > 0:
00405                         self.removeRows(0, self.rowCount())
00406                 for x in list:
00407                         # If name (for example) is False we just want to print it as empty text
00408                         # not as 'False' string.
00409                         l = [QStandardItem(unicode( x[y] or '' )) for y in self.serverOrder ]
00410                         self.rootItem.appendRow( l )
00411
